name: PlanDefinition
title: PlanDefinition
publisher: Health Level Seven International (Clinical Decision Support)
description: This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules, order sets, protocols, and drug formularies.

elements.name: PlanDefinition
elements.description: This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact.

elements.name: url
elements.description: An absolute URI that is used to identify this plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this plan definition when it is represented in other formats.

elements.name: version
elements.description: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the plan definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A natural language name identifying the plan definition.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the plan definition.

elements.name: subtitle
elements.description: An explanatory or alternate title for the plan definition giving additional information about its content.

elements.name: type
elements.description: A high-level category for the plan definition that distinguishes the kinds of systems that would be interested in the plan definition.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of this plan definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

elements.name: experimental
elements.description: A Boolean value to indicate that this plan definition is authored for testing purposes and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

elements.name: subjectCodeableConcept
elements.description: A code or group definition that describes the intended subject of the plan definition.

elements.name: subjectReference
elements.description: A reference to a group definition that describes the intended subject of the plan definition.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: publisher
elements.description: The name of the organization or individual that published the plan definition.

elements.name: contact
elements.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

elements.name: description
elements.description: A free text natural language description of the plan definition from a consumer's perspective.

elements.name: useContext
elements.description: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed.

elements.name: jurisdiction
elements.description: A legal or geographic region in which the plan definition is intended to be used.

elements.name: purpose
elements.description: Explanation of why this plan definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

elements.name: usage
elements.description: A detailed description of how the plan definition is used from a clinical perspective.

elements.name: copyright
elements.description: A copyright statement relating to the plan definition and/or its contents.

elements.name: approvalDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher.

elements.name: lastReviewDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: effectivePeriod
elements.description: The period during which the plan definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

elements.name: topic
elements.description: Descriptive topics related to the content of the plan definition.

elements.name: author
elements.description: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

elements.name: editor
elements.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

elements.name: reviewer
elements.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

elements.name: endorser
elements.description: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

elements.name: relatedArtifact
elements.description: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

elements.name: library
elements.description: A reference to a Library resource containing any formal logic used by the plan definition.

elements.name: goal
elements.description: Goals that describe what the activities within the plan are intended to achieve.

elements.name: action
elements.description: An action or group of actions to be taken as part of the plan.
